title: Job Vacancies at Lauvee Beauty Salon
content:
Lauvee Beauty is a luxury salon situated at Wuse 2, the heart of Abuja. It is privately owned and strives to positively enrich our clients with beauty, luxury and lifestyle. We render excellent services ranging from sales of raw human hairs, manicures and pedicures, lash extensions, microblading and above all, our excellent customer care services are experiences you wouldn't want to miss. Our salon is literally a home away from home as we have a very spacious and serene environment, making sure we give our clients comfortability at its peak.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Lash Technician

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Requirements


	Applicant must be good at all kinds of Lashes, Microblading, Lamination, Eyebrow Carving, etc
	1 - 2 years of experience as a lash technician
	Perform eyelash extension application and removal
	Advise clients on lash aftercare and maintenance
	Maintain hygienic tools and workspace
	Manage client bookings and follow-up
	People-friendly and detail-oriented
	Knowledge of eyelash extension techniques and safety.


Application Closing Date: 30th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lauveebeauty@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Receptionist

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a reliable, well-spoken, and customer-oriented Receptionist (preferably female) to manage front desk operations and ensure a welcoming experience for all clients.
	The ideal candidate will be the face of our brand - professional, organized, and passionate about customer care.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet and attend to clients in a warm, friendly, and professional manner
	Answer calls, respond to inquiries, and schedule client appointments
	Confirm, reschedule, and follow up on bookings
	Handle client check-in/check-out and payment processes
	Maintain a clean, organized, and inviting reception area
	Provide accurate information about services, pricing, and ongoing offers
	Support the day-to-day operations of the salon and spa team
	Keep client records organized and confidential.


Requirements


	Must possess a BSc or HND in any relevant field
	2 - 5 years of previous experience in a customer service or receptionist role (experience in a salon/spa is an advantage)
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
	Good computer skills (Microsoft Office, POS/booking software)
	Must be punctual, neatly groomed, and well-presented
	Preferably female, due to the nature of client interaction and environment.


What We Offer


	A friendly and professional work environment
	Opportunity to grow with a reputable beauty and wellness brand
	Staff discounts on services and products
	On-the-job training and development.


Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lauveebeauty@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For further enquiries, call: +234 915 360 7927 .

 

3.) Assistant Manager

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Are you organized, proactive, and passionate about customer service and team leadership? Lauvee Beauty Salon is looking for a highly motivated and experienced Assistant Manager to join our growing team.


Responsibilities


	Support the Salon Manager in daily operations and overall team supervision
	Ensure exceptional customer service and satisfaction
	Manage appointment bookings and front desk activities
	Oversee staff schedules, performance, and attendance
	Assist with inventory control and stock management
	Coordinate marketing efforts and customer engagement initiatives
	Maintain cleanliness and compliance with hygiene standards
	Handle basic administrative tasks and reporting duties


Requirements


	BSc or HND in Business Administration, Office Management, or a relevant field
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in a supervisory or managerial role
	Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills
	Proficiency in basic office tools and customer management systems is an added advantage
	Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.


Application Closing Date: 30th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lauveebeauty@gmail.com using "Application for Assistant Manager Role" as the subject of the mail.
